Class FindLocationAtOnce

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nirmalpatidar123.utils.FindLocationAtOnce
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.location.LocationListener

    public final class FindLocationAtOnce
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.location.LocationListener
    Class that implements LocationListener to find device current location from various providers

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FindLocationAtOnce.FoundLocationInterface
      An Inner Interface of this class have method public void doOnLocationReceived(Location location); This method is called when device' location changed or we found a new location.
